title: Jayce Q E doesn't work when on raised geometry
body:
Exactly what the title says, started playing a bit of {{champion:126}} . He's kinda fun but when you try to E Q in ranged form when on raised geometry it doesn't work and you get that weak as Q. Kinda dodgy and it had me wondering if any other champs have problems like this.
By raised Geometry I mean, you're on a high platform and you place your E on a lower platform and attempt to shoot the Q through the E.

replies.body: Well, if you are at a raised platform and the E is on a lower area, it makes sense Q will just travel over it?
Theirs no Y axis, so the ability isn't going over it.
Really, because this only happens to me with the situation that I said :s
Proof is when tristana tries to 'jump' out of the teamfight but a blitz just shoots his hand and grabs her even though she's in the clouds
